amendatorysection.catchline: Department of Economic Development; report; contents.
amendatorysection.para: By November 15 of each odd-numbered year, the Department of Economic Development shall submit a report to the Legislature and the Governor that includes:
(1) The number and geographic location of qualified investors;
(3) A breakdown of the industry sectors in which qualified small businesses are involved;
(4) The number of actual tax credits issued by project under the Angel Investment Tax Credit Act on an annual basis; and
(5) The number of jobs created at each qualified small business.
